definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

lit. like raindrops on a pear blossom (idiom)/fig. tear-stained face of a beauty
Lishu district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang

Kong Rong giving up pears, classic moral story about Kong Rong 孔融[Kong3 Rong2] picking up smaller pears while leaving the bigger ones to his older brothers, still used nowadays to educate the young on courtesy and modesty

sentences.english: Form pyriform to oblong or elongated .
A pear or a grape, Mama?
I went to my student 's orchard to pick peaches and pears .
sentences.chinese: 我到学生的果园去摘桃子和梨。

sentences.english: Weigh these pears on the balance.
sentences.chinese: 在秤上称一称梨的重量。

sentences.english: When you get hungry, just pluck a pear off the tree and eat it.
sentences.chinese: 肚子饿了你就从树上采摘一个梨吃吧。

sentences.english: The piriformis fossa and greater trochanter are viable starting points for antegrade nailing.
sentences.chinese: 在梨状肌窝和大转子是可行的出发点，顺行穿钉治疗。

sentences.english: The cashew apple grows in Brazil and it cannot be transported due to its fragility.
sentences.chinese: 酪梨苹果生长在巴西，因其果实易碎而不能运输。

sentences.english: Therefore, soft pear infants also called "pear perfume."
sentences.chinese: 因此，软儿梨也称“香水梨”。

sentences.english: The gentle acidity and marked fruitiness of a well balanced Pinot Gris perfectly complements roast pork with a stewed pear sauce.
sentences.chinese: 水果香味丰裕浓烈，完美融合了炖梨酱烤猪肉的美味。

sentences.english: I like eggs, meat, rice, bread and pears.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢蛋，肉，米饭，面包和梨。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the regularity invading adjacent tissue of pyriform sinus carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨梨状窝癌侵犯邻近组织的规律。

sentences.english: Drinks water without enough time, the backgammon supermarket's staff then proposed looks at the pear.
sentences.chinese: 来不及喝口水，步步高超市的工作人员便提议去看梨。

sentences.english: Lucy likes bananas, bread, meat, milk and rice.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢蛋，肉，米饭，面包和梨。

sentences.english: Ramadan changed the working pattern of Muslim restaurants in Itaewon.
sentences.chinese: 斋月改变了梨泰院穆斯林餐厅的工作模式。

sentences.english: This paper studies on the inheritance of the stone cells in the pear flesh of the progeny hybrids.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了梨的杂种后代果肉中石细胞的遗传。

sentences.english: Bananas or apples are fine. Just don't buy pears, please.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉，苹果都可以，但是，千万不要买梨。

definition: Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta
papaya (Carica papaya)/genus Chaenomeles of shrubs in the family Rosaceae/Chinese flowering quince (Chaenomeles speciosa)
